mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST(wish_no, prod_no, USER_ID) values (seq_wishlist_wish_no.nextval, #{prodNo}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT W.*, (P.QUANTITY-NVL(A.SUM,0)) remain, PPRICE, P.PROD_NAME FROM WISHLIST W, PRODUCT P, (SELECT prod_no, SUM(buyNum) SUM FROM TRANSACTION GROUP BY prod_no) A WHERE W.PROD_NO = A.PROD_NO AND W.prod_no = P.prod_no AND wish_no = #{wishNo}
